article_title: Expanding Medicaid in NC would add to successful federal-state tradition
article_text:
State-federal partnerships, like Medicaid expansion, have a history of success and have been a hallmark of Republican governance for more than a century

The North Carolina legislature should revisit Medicaid expansion during this year’s session with a vision that extends beyond short-term election cycles

article_metadata.news-keywords: medicaid, expansion, NC, north carolina, republican, conservative, eisenhower, interstate, pollack, families, USA, lincoln, land grant, college
article_metadata.description: The North Carolina legislature should revisit Medicaid expansion during this year’s session with a vision that extends beyond short-term election cycles, but rather looks out toward generations yet to come – as great Republican leaders like Lincoln and Eisenhower did.
article_metadata.title: Expanding Medicaid in NC would add to successful federal-state tradition | News & Observer
